description:
These are no ordinary bicycle tubes! These extra strong inner tubes stop flats for 2 years because there is Slime inside.

- No more flats for 2 years!
- Extra strong with Slime sealant inside...

These are no ordinary bicycle tubes. These extra strong inner tubes stop flats for 2 years because there is Slime inside. Extra strong because there's Slime inside. Instantly seals tread area punctures up to 1/8 (3 mm) in size Seals multiple punctures repeatedly Non-toxic and non-flammable Cleans up with water Tube sizes and valve types available for nearly every type of bike. Works in bicycles, wheelbarrows, wheelchairs, jogging strollers, snow blowers and much more.

These are no ordinary bicycle tubes. These extra strong inner tubes stop flats for 2 years because there is Slime inside. Extra strong because there's Slime inside. Works in bicycles, wheelbarrows, wheelchairs, jogging strollers, snow blowers and much more.
name: 24 Slime Bicycle Tube
Extra Strong Self-Sealing Schrader Valve Tube
Slime Extra Strong Self-Sealing Bicycle Tube Schrader 24" x 1.75-2.125" Bike Inner Tube - 30047
Slime Extra Strong Self-Sealing Bicycle Tube Schrader 24" x 1.75-2.125" - 30047

review.name: No air pump needed
review.reviewBody: My tire had a slow leak. I had to pump it up every week. I replaced the tube and haven't had to pump it up in a month. Just jump on and go! I should have gotten two.

review.name: A must for your bike
review.reviewBody: In this day and age when everyone everyone is trying to get healthy and riding a bicycle is a an excellent way to get fit. Being safe on uoyr bike is very important a nd a sudden flat tire can cause many problems. This self sealing iner tuble for your bike tire will jeep you safer in the event of a blowout. I would suggest uou buy 2 so you have an extra on hand just in case. Be safe out there and obey the rules of the road.

review.name: Extra Strong Self Sealing Tube
review.reviewBody:
The Slime Extra Strong self sealing tube is amazing!
Excellent quality. I used it for my cousins bicycle.
You determine the size tube that you need by checking 
the bicycle tire on the bike. You will find the width 
and diameter that is marked.
What this product does is when the bicycle tire is punctured 
the air escapes in the tire, then pressure forces Slimes 
 FibroSeal small particles in the hole. This repairs the tire 
puncture. Also works for two years and is non toxic and
non flammable. Follow directions to install that are on the
box. It is fantastic! 5 stars!

review.name: Want security with ride? Slime for life
review.reviewBody:
I absolutely love these tubes for my bike for the slime inside keeps my bike from having flats.  I feel safe having extra one of these on my rides just in case but hardly ever have to worry about flats though accidents can happen.
I been using these for almost 10 years and have had only 3 flats and only because of accidentally riding over broken glass.  Best tubes EVER

review.name: It's a must if you own a bike
review.reviewBody: I was absolutely impressed. I had my doubts but it worked like magic. If you own a bike, it's a must to have on hand. I do a lot of off reading on my bike with my son. I have had multiple incidents where these inner tubes would have come in handy. LIKE TODAY but I had it on my bike this time. I pulled the nail out and I didn't hear a hiss.. the tire remained inflated.

review.name: Such a great tire tube!
review.reviewBody: This is one of my new favorite tire tubes to have around the garage. I've worked with local bike repair non-profits, and we've gone through a lot of tubes as we've worked on bike tires, and this is nicer and more sturdy than the ones I remember using. I think the valve is more appropriate for the newer bikes, and I'm glad that it will self-seal if we ever run over something that punctures the tire. Who knew that I would be excited to run over a nail and watch a tube do its work?!

review.name: Told everyone
review.reviewBody:
I received this slime self healing bike tire to test at no charge for my honest opinion. This is good it is awesome I thought maybe it would feel bumpy or something hard in the tire but it doesn't, the slime doesn't seem to pool at the bottom it really is a very smooth ride I got so excited I told everybody about this it is amazing and very useful I wonder can we do this on car tires because that's awesome that would really be amazing. It is easy to put on a bicycle just like the rest of the tires fill it with air just like the rest of the tires and it works it works beautifully. 
Smooth ride.

review.name: Simple!
review.reviewBody:
Our slime extra strong self-sealing tube came at the perfect time! My daughter and I just purchased bikes and the one she got had a completely flat tire! We tried blowing it up multiple times, but it just kept going flat! 
 Installing the tube is pretty easy! You make sure the tire is deflated the whole way and then get the tire of the rim. Add a little bit of air to the new tube before inserting the valve and inserting the tube into the tire. Make the the tire goes onto the rim correctly and gently enough not to pinch the tube. Then inflate to the correct psi! Simple simple! Finally we were able to try out the new bikes- and had a blast!

review.name: Inner tube
review.reviewBody: This inner tube seems well made. My husband says it's a good one. Very thick and not easy to tear; rubber seems thicker than most. When we need to replace one, this may last longer than the current one.

review.name: Slime tire tube
review.reviewBody: When I first received the product I noticed that the package (box) does not hold the weight of the product. Slips right out of the bottom of box. After reading the product label I was concerned about the large warning label disclosing health and safety hazards. This product was for my teenage grandson so I am sure you can understand my concerns. The product has a very limited warranty, only covering a specific puncture. The installation directions are easy to follow. Using gloves and eye protection my grandson was able to follow the directions without any problem. He is back to riding his bike. With teenage boys this product has a "cool slime" component.
